attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You want us to pay more, for driving on worn out roads, no white lines, no cats eyes, no edge markings, everything that should make driving safer, No, cameras are more important] You should try driving for your self, give it a try. I dont suppose you will, so far away from us normal people. \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\Its a shame, because, we are ok, most of us are fun, happy, loyal, its a shame you dont apreciate it, happier to look after imigrants than the people who made, Great Bitain, Great. Well, Great, it isnt any more, thanks Tony

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
